sources.title: Early Experimental Sound Film
sources.description: This very early sound film premiered at the Rivoli Theater , New York City on April 15, 1923 along with other films produced using the Phonofilm sound-on-film process.  In the film,  Noble Sissle and Eubie Blake perform some popular songs of the time including, "Sons of Old Black Joe", "My Swanee Home", "Affectionate Dan" and "All God's Chillun".
